projectGridLines.title: Software Engineer Intern (BE and FE)
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Voltmoney is revolutionizing financial technology! We're developing a cutting-edge tech stack designed to transform financial services operations, making it the most advanced system in the industry. As part of our team, you'll get hands-on experience building large-scale financial systems such as Loan Management Systems, Loan Origination Systems, and KYC systems.

 

You'll collaborate with highly skilled engineers on Java Spring Boot-based microservices architecture, all deployed on a serverless infrastructure. Additionally, you'll have the chance to work on exciting third-party integrations with organizations like UIDAI, Payment Gateways, Banks, and NPCI.

 

This is a unique opportunity to enhance your skills, work on impactful projects, and contribute to the future of financial technology. Come innovate with us at Voltmoney!

 

Skill sets: Problem Solving, Data Structures, Experience with Java/Spring Boot will be an added advantage. JS/React JS/React Native experience for FE projects.

Traits expectation: Extreme Ownership, Entrepreneurial Mindset and

Expected learning: You will get the opportunity to learn on building large scale backend systems from scratch, integration with external systems, start up experience.
